scripts.buildHTML: npx yaml2json _resume.yml | npx hbs --partial './src/partials/**/*.hbs' --helper './src/helpers/dateFormat.js' -i -o dist -- src/index.hbs
scripts.build: yarn run buildHTML && yarn run buildTailwind
scripts.watch: (npx onchange -i '*resume.yml' 'src/**/*' -- yarn run buildHTML) & (yarn run buildTailwind --watch)
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
